data.name: WordType
desc: Constants to specify the type of words.
Used with XBreakIterator.nextWord(), XBreakIterator.previousWord(), XBreakIterator.getWordBoundary(), XBreakIterator.getWordType(), XBreakIterator.isBeginWord(), XBreakIterator.isEndWord()

items.name: ANY_WORD
lines: Any \"words\" - words in the meaning of same character types, collection of alphanumeric characters, or collection of non-alphanumeric characters.

items.name: ANYWORD_IGNOREWHITESPACES
lines: Any \"words\" - words in the meaning of same character types, collection of alphanumeric characters, or collection of non-alphanumeric characters except blanks.

items.name: DICTIONARY_WORD
lines: \"words\" - in the meaning of a collection of alphanumeric characters and some punctuations, like dot for abbreviation.

items.name: WORD_COUNT
lines: The mode for counting words, it will combine punctuations and spaces as word trail.
